title: Was Sen. Chuck Schumer a Client of ‘Hollywood Madam’ Heidi Fleiss?
subtitle: 8chan and #QAnon trolls worked diligently to push this smear campaign into the mainstream.
author: David Emery
vclaim: Sen. Chuck Schumer's name and/or phone number were found in "Hollywood Madam" Heidi Fleiss's black book of clients.
